title: What causes reps to suddenly disappear in large batches when we haven't been downvoted?

post.title: What causes reps to suddenly disappear in large batches when we haven't been downvoted?

author.bio: Founded +foodporn, +foodpics and +citypop. Former active user, current lurker; contact me at u/lol on getcomet.net
author.bio_html: Founded +foodporn, +foodpics and +citypop. Former active user, current lurker; contact me at u/lol on getcomet.net

body: I was in a conversation with @HoardingMinimalist two days ago and they pointed out that their rep didn't line up. I counted my rep (at the time I had 39 rep) and I noticed that without my own upvotes I had 37 karma, but counting my own upvotes I had 43. What is up with it?
body_html: I was in a conversation with @HoardingMinimalist two days ago and they pointed out that their rep didn't line up. I counted my rep (at the time I had 39 rep) and I noticed that without my own upvotes I had 37 karma, but counting my own upvotes I had 43. What is up with it?

post.title: What causes reps to suddenly disappear in large batches when we haven't been downvoted?

body: Every time I make a post I can expect my rep to change by about 30, either up or down. No idea why.
body_html: Every time I make a post I can expect my rep to change by about 30, either up or down. No idea why.
